name: MonkeeeSmeeesh
description:
Welcome to MonkeeeSmeeesh ! This game is a small storytelling game with beautiful pixel art which was developed for the Winter Game Jam 2022. The theme was "you are the enemy".                             How to play:

Installation Guide

1. Download the zip file

2. Right-click on "extract all" and select

3. Save the file in a safe place

4. Run the .exe file and have fun
